display_name: Calculated - RDI in NREM sleep (>= 4% desaturation)
description: missing if studies with problems scoring REM/NREM or if studies scored as sleep/wake or NREM sleep time is 4
calculation: rdimnr4p  = 60*(hnrbp4 + hnrop4 + canbp4 + canop4 + oanbp4 + oanop4 + manrbp4 + manrop4)/(slpprdp - minremp)
